overview: This shocking but fascinating cable TV show brought smut in it's finest form to late-night fans. This fourth volume sheds light on the freakiest freaks and the geekiest geeks with Tara Alexander setting out to set the first gangbang world record with 83 men in one night, swapping and swinging at clubs, a brutal dominatrix and all male all-nude revue.
title: Midnight Blue: Vol. 4: Freaks & Geeks
